name: lemon-mart-serve-monorepo
description: Easy to learn and use full-stack Typescript with Angular

scripts.init:env: init-dev-env generate-dot-env example.env -f && init-dev-env generate-dot-env server-example.env --source=. --target=server -f
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix ./server && npm run build --prefix ./web-app -- --configuration=lemon-mart-server

author: Jadir Junior
